definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of surgical treatment of giant clival chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨型斜坡中线区脊索瘤的手术治疗方法。

sentences.english: The team found that the key appears to be joints in the bony vertebrae that wrap protectively around the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 这个团队发现起关键作用的是包围脊索的脊椎骨关节。

sentences.english: Conclusions Complete resection of tumor is the most effective way to manage sacrum chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 结论骶骨脊索瘤的最佳治疗为广泛的手术切除。

sentences.english: Chordoma is a more common tumor in this location than chondrosarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 在这个区域，脊索瘤比软骨肉瘤更常见。

sentences.english: An extensive sacrococcygeal chordoma is considered a challenge for neurosurgeons.
sentences.chinese: 广泛性骶尾椎脊索瘤被认为是神经外科的挑战。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss and explore the clinical effect of radiotherapy for chordoma in sacrum caudal region.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨放疗在骶尾部脊索瘤临床治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: The vertebrate spine or spinal column.
sentences.chinese: 脊索但无真正的脊柱鱼类动物。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the efficacy of tumor resection or curettage for sacral chordoma through the anterior-posterior combined approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍原发性骶骨脊索瘤手术治疗的初步经验。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical characteristics and treatment of patients with chordomas in the skull base.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颅底脊索瘤的临床特点及治疗。

sentences.english: There was a significant correlation between the kyphotic angle and the degree of spinal cord flattening.
sentences.chinese: 后凸角和脊索扁平程度的相关性是有意义的。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical methods of sacral chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骶骨脊索瘤的外科治疗方法。
脊索瘤是极少见的恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Connectors for both the ridge cobles and the bottom hoop cobles are weldments .
sentences.chinese: 脊索及底部环索上的连接件均为焊接件。

sentences.english: Skull base chondrosarcomas may be confused with chordomas.
sentences.chinese: 颅底软骨肉瘤可能与脊索瘤难于鉴别。

sentences.english: When notochord organization is ceaseless and migratory, fiber annulus also increases.
sentences.chinese: 在脊索组织不断迁移时，纤维环亦增大。

sentences.english: Besides, the treatment of chordomas remains a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 脊索瘤之治疗仍是一个很大的挑战。

definition: visceral arch (gill-bearing arch or its vestigial crease on sides of neck of vertebrates)
bony fishes/Osteichthyes (taxonomic class including most fish)
